typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		LotId as string,
		Fab as string,
		Family as string,
		Technology as string,
		Plan as string,
		Device as string,
		SourceLot as string,
		LotClass as string,
		wf_num as short,
		wf_id as string,
		Sequence as string,
		ProcStep as string,
		Stage as string,
		orig_slot as short,
		final_slot as short,
		orig_cass as short,
		final_cass as short,
		zone as string,
		zone_seat as string,
		boat_seat as string,
		subtool as string,
		equipment as string,
		trackInTime as string,
		trackOutTime as string,
		recipe as string,
		Operator as string,
		Tooling as string,
		ReworkCount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	skipLines: 1,
	wildcardPaths:['inbound/site/USR/WEH/*.gz']) ~> source2
source2 derive(trackInTime_formated = toTimestamp(trackInTime, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'),
		trackOutTime_formated = toTimestamp(trackOutTime, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'adls',
	folderPath: 'translated/delta/site/USR/WEH',
	truncate: false,
	mergeSchema: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink4
